knownrelatives: Jason Wyngrade (father, deceased), Regan Wyngarde (Lady Mastermind, half-sister)
powers: Mastermind is a novice, telepath, able to mingle projected illusions with actual memories, creating "realities" that are hypnotically powerful. This allows her modify her victims behavior.
significantissues: Allied with Arcade, vs Wolverine & Gambit (Wolverine/Gambit: Victims #1-4, 1995)
allied with Mystique, betrayed X-Corps (Uncanny X-Men #401-406, 2002)
